verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מָלָךְ֮ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth גֵּא֪וּת <S%H1348><s%> with majesty לָ֫בֵ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> he is clothed לָבֵ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> is clothed יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> with strength הִתְאַזָּ֑ר <S%H247><s%> [wherewith] he hath girded אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed תִּכּ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> also is stablished תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <S%H8398><s%> himself the world בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest תִּמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> that it cannot be moved
נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> [is] established כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <S%H3678><s%> Thy throne מֵאָ֑ז <S%H227><s%> of old מֵֽעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> thou [art] from everlasting אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

נָשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> have lifted up נְהָר֨וֹת ׀ <S%H5104><s%> The floods יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD נָשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> have lifted up נְהָר֣וֹת <S%H5104><s%> the floods קוֹלָ֑ם <S%H6963><s%> their voice יִשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> lift up נְהָר֣וֹת <S%H5104><s%> the floods דָּכְיָֽם׃ <S%H1796><s%> their waves

מִקֹּל֨וֹת ׀ <S%H6963><s%> than the noise מַ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> of many אַדִּירִ֣ים <S%H117><s%> [is] mightier מִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <S%H4867><s%> waves יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea אַדִּ֖יר <S%H117><s%> [yea than] the mighty בַּמָּר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> on high יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD

עֵֽדֹתֶ֨יךָ ׀ <S%H5713><s%> Thy testimonies נֶאֶמְנ֬וּ <S%H539><s%> sure מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> are very לְבֵיתְךָ֥ <S%H1004><s%> thine house נַאֲוָה־ <S%H4998><s%> becometh קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> holiness יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD לְאֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> forever יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> age
